Package com.gridgraph.structure.lifecycle

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGridGraphLifeCycleListener
    Lifecycle listener to be called when GridGraph server starts up or shuts down
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClusterNodesLifecycleListener
    Lifecycle listener to be called for distributed storage cluster nodes management when GridGraph server is shutting down.
    DefaultGraphHeapLoaderListener
    Lifecycle listener for GridGraph to load heap data of default graph
    DefaultGraphVertexLoaderListerner Deprecated
    GraphManagerLifeCycleListener
    Lifecycle listener for GridGraph to clean up resource managed by GridGraphManager
    GridGraphLifeCycle
    GridGraphLifeCycle is an implementation of gremlin LifeCycleHook, acting as hook of server startup and shutdown
    RemoteDatabaseLifeCycleListener
    Close the databases when shutdown server
    SecurityDatabaseLifeCycleListener
    Initialize the security database if not exist when server start, close the database when server shutdown
